name: basic-vite-react
label: Basic Template
description: Lightweight Vite starter template for building fast static websites

name: basic-2d-game
label: Basic 2D Game Template
description: Template for creating 2D games using Phaser with React integration. Ideal for platformers, top-down games, and side-scrollers with physics, sprites, and animations.

name: basic-3d-game
label: Basic 3D Game Template
description: Template for building 3D games using Three.js and react-three-fiber. Perfect for creating immersive 3D environments, first-person experiences, and interactive 3D visualizations.

name: basic-3d-character-animation
label: 3D Character Animation Template
description: Template for implementing 3D rigged(mixamo) character with animations using Three.js. Features GLB model loading, animation system for creating interactive 3D character models.

name: basic-2d-character-animation
label: 2D Character Animation Template
description: This example demonstrates how to load a character configuration file and set up a character using the Phaser game engine. The character configuration file includes settings for the character’s origin, collision boundaries, and animations (idle, move, attack). It also explains how to control the character’s state and animations using keyboard inputs (arrow keys and space bar).

name: basic-3d-isometric-keyboard-control
label: Basic 3D Isometric Keyboard Control Template
description: Template for creating isometric 3D games using Three.js and react-three-fiber. Features include GLB model loading, character animation system, isometric camera, and keyboard controls.
